explanation: [0-0] In a room, a blonde woman in a yellow dress with her hair tied up is kneeling on a gray floor. Behind her stands a woman with long hair wearing a purple crown ornament and a woman with short hair in a black dress. On the floor in front of them are green, yellow, and blue square boxes from left to right. In front of them, a tripod with a phone is filming them, with a countdown displayed on the phone screen.

[0-2] As the countdown on the phone screen disappears, the woman in the black dress stands behind the three squares, smiles and walks towards the right side of the screen, then stops in front of the blue square.

[2-4] Then the woman in the black dress puts her left hand on her hip, looks at the front of the screen and walks with a smile behind the green square. After that, she puts her hands on both sides of her body, jumps in place and crushes the green square.

[4-6] Then the camera pans and the scene changes. The woman in the yellow dress is kneeling on the ground, supporting herself with her left hand and gathering the scattered green sequins on the ground with her right hand. The woman with the purple crown ornament is standing next to her. At this time, the phone screen placed on the tripod on the floor is playing the video of the woman in the black dress. The woman in the black dress stands behind the woman in the yellow dress and puts her hand on her shoulder.
